reviews.text: Huge thanks to Manager Irene for making our group reservation so easy and helping us sort out our food orders — everything went so smoothly. Really appreciate the extra small sides too! Thanks for taking such great care of us. Will definitely be back!

Almost every weekends eat lunch at Hans w family cos we live 5 mins walk away.

Tried many of their dishes. Food is good enough to satisfy my family. A very spacious air-conditioned place to have lunch w family on weekends.

I ordered the sweet and sour pork rice. The dish had a strong oily taste, likely due to the wok not being thoroughly cleaned. The sauce was also a bit too sweet for my preference. Otherwise, it was enjoyable. The other dish that I ordered was herbal chicken with rice which was quite tasty.

This is such an old school Han’s outlet, that have accompanied me through numerous childhood memories.

The breakfast sets and Kaya toasts have always been my all time go to. Their butter Kaya is generous and their breakfast set scrambled eggs are generous and fluffy. Their buttered toasts are well made too.

Drinks can’t go wrong!

Posting review as a regular diner here, food quality and staff attitude is excellent.
Recommend their plant based cuisine and western menu.
However, the toilet is always in an unkept state. Usually found with stains on toilet, and a messy floor. Occasionally comes with foul smell.
